"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e48d706368723031cd0700#post_54e48d706368723031cd0700

topics.author: 5446fcfc6368723ec21a0000

topics.body:
I didn't have classes today so I went to see if Ivy's home. Sure enough she was and we hung out like always. Long story short, [spoiler]I found myself inside her cave South of her black forest.[/spoiler]

That's not the most interesting part.
[spoiler]Her fluids shot up straight to my left eye. And that was my good eye. It burned like Hell. After a few moments I was able to see clearly again. And after a few more she stopped apologizing.[/spoiler]

So I guess love really is blind. Or makes you for a few seconds.
topics.author: 52f0834d63687261cba90300
